critique: This document establishes an interagency council and advisory committee to promote the development and adoption of biobased products and bioenergy. It aims to stimulate economic growth in rural areas, enhance energy security, and improve environmental sustainability. The order emphasizes coordinated federal programs, research, and private sector incentives. It does not directly address immigration, executive power, security vs. liberty, or social inclusion. The focus is on economic regulation through government intervention to promote specific industries and federalism by creating federal bodies to oversee the effort.
